effect.0336.name: Self-Loathing
effect.0336.desc: Decreases Movement Speed and MP Regen.
effect.0336.msg.1:
Wanna know the ugly truth?
No one will notice when you‚Äôre gone.
effect.0336.msg.2:
When was the last time someone called out to you?
You can‚Äôt remember.
effect.0336.msg.3:
Take a good look at the mirror.
It‚Äôs the face nobody pays any mind.
effect.0336.msg.4:
You hear laughter from the other room.
A fun conversation ‚Äî you excluded from it.
effect.0336.msg.5:
Your favorite places.
Your favorite food.
A feeling you can share with no one.
Isn‚Äôt that great?
effect.0336.msg.6:
Ever noticed while talking to someone?
Conversation is nothing more than just a social obligation.
effect.0336.msg.7:
Did someone call your name?
Nobody‚Äôs there‚Ä¶
Auditory hallucinations are the first sign of loneliness.
effect.0336.msg.8:
You once joined others in laughter.
Nowadays it‚Äôs nothing but noise.
When did you change?
effect.0336.msg.9:
Nobody pays attention even when you talk to them.
You‚Äôve gotten used to the feeling.
effect.0336.msg.10:
‚ÄúSee you next time!‚Äù
When was the last time you heard that?
